alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 3:31PM EDT until March 19 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 2 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with localized totals up to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin and Western Essex Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 2 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Only up to 2 inches of snow expected for eastern Essex, northern two-thirds of Franklin, and locations north of a South Edwards to Gale line in southeastern St Lawrence counties. Heaviest snowfall accumulations will likely occur towards locations along NY Route 3 like Wanakena and Tupper Lake.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Essex
